attributes.action: Get Katie Hopkins off Twitter for good
attributes.additional_details:
Her nasty comments regarding Austin children!!!

Her disgusting comments about dementia. 

Weight jibes to jelly clarkson.

Danny dyer insults bout his girlfriend proposing to him!
attributes.background:
This creature does nothing but say the most offensive of comments and derogatory statements to some of the most vulnerable people alive. 
Take away her stage and watch this vermin crawl back under her stone for good!

rejection.details: The Government does not have the powers to determine Twitter's terms of service or the way that it implements them. Twitter, a private company, decides who may and may not have a Twitter account and operate it.
